A quick reference for common terms used across the FADS Open Science Hub.

## Acronyms

| Acronym | Meaning |
|---|---|
| CSAS | Canadian Science Advisory Secretariat |
| DFO | Fisheries and Oceans Canada |
| DSU | Data Stewardship Unit |
| FADS | Fisheries and Assessment Data Section |
| FSAR | Fisheries Science Advisory Report |
| IRI | Internationalized Resource Identifier |
| SDEP | Salmon Data Exchange Package |
| SKOS | Simple Knowledge Organization System |
| URI | Uniform Resource Identifier |

## Common terms

### Controlled vocabulary
A curated set of approved terms and definitions used consistently across datasets.

### Ontology
A formal representation of domain concepts, relationships, and identifiers that supports machine-readable interoperability.

### Data package
A structured bundle of data files plus metadata files describing schema, meaning, and provenance.

### Column dictionary
A metadata table documenting each variable (column) in a dataset, including data type, role, and semantic mapping.

### Concept scheme
A SKOS collection organizing related concepts, often used for controlled codes.
